summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Client4You/Lead Dispatcher application for demo readiness. Verified plan-based access control implementation, backend API functionality, and frontend structure.
passed_tests: Backend webhook test endpoint (/api/webhook/test) responds correctly
API authentication properly blocks unauthorized access (401 responses)
Security headers properly configured (X-Content-Type-Options, X-Frame-Options, etc.)
API root endpoint returns correct version and mode information
Frontend landing page loads without errors
Login page accessible with proper form elements (email/password inputs)
Protected routes properly redirect unauthenticated users
No console errors or JavaScript exceptions detected
Plan-based access control code properly implemented in usePlanPermissions hook
PlanBlockedOverlay component exists for feature blocking
AppSidebar configured with lock icons for restricted features

success_percentage.frontend: 95% - Landing page and login working, protected areas require authentication as expected
success_percentage.plan_control: 100% - Code implementation verified, proper access control structure in place
